00027 #include <Inventor/lists/SbPList.h>
00028 
00029 class  COIN_DLL_API SbIntList : public SbPList {
00030 public:
00031   SbIntList(void) : SbPList () { }
00032   SbIntList(const int sizehint) : SbPList(sizehint) { }
00033   
00034   void append(const int item) {
00035     ((SbPList*)this)->append((void*)((unsigned long)item));
00036   }
00037   int find(const int item) {
00038     return ((SbPList*)this)->find((void *)((unsigned long)item));
00039   }
00040   void insert(const int item, const int addbefore) {
00041     ((SbPList*)this)->insert((void *)((unsigned long)item), addbefore);
00042   }
00043   int & operator[](const int idx) const {
00044     return (int&) ((*(const SbPList*)this)[idx]);
00045   }
00046 };
00047 
00048 #endif // !COIN_SBINTLIST_H
